original_text: Jesus said, ‘When this voice spoke, it was not so that it could help me. No, it spoke so that it could help you.
korean_text: 예수께서 대답하여 이르시되 이 소리가 난 것은 나를 위한 것이 아니요 너희를 위한 것이니라

sentences.original_text: it was not so that it could help me
No, it spoke so that it could help you.'
sentences.korean_translation: 아니, 그것은 너희를 돕기 위해 말했다.
